author: admin
title: Leicestershire cricket club say court claims from wife-beater that he had been offered a contract – which helped him … – The Sun
text:
Opinion HOWZAT JUSTICE? Leicestershire cricket club say court claims from wife-beater that he had been offered a contract – which helped him dodge jail – are ‘completely false’ 
Mustafa Bashir's lawyer claimed he was set to join former county cricket champions Leicestershire - something the club has strongly denied By Amanda Devlin 27th March 2017, 9:01 am Updated: 27th March 2017, 1:09 pm
